content: कुकूलः, --लं {@--1@} Chaff; कुकूलानां राशौ तदनु हृदयं पच्यत इव <ls>U. 6. 38.</ls> {@--2@} A fire made of chaff. --लं {@--1@} A hole, ditch (filled with stakes). {@--2@} An armour, mail.
